commit.message: Simplify, combine Unit constructors, remove unused constructor

nodes.bodyText: side-comment: @trevan I somewhat wonder if originalowner should be set in the constructor so that it is always non-null. It does look like owner should be non-null as it defaults to null_player_id. Hence, it's unclear if serialization has something to do with the nullity of unit owners.
